citation: Proclamation under the Tasmanian Museum and Art Gallery Act 2017 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Tasmanian Museum and Art Gallery Act 2017

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Tasmanian Museum and Art Gallery Act 2017 fix 14 February 2018 as the day on which that Act commences.

19 December 2017

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for the Arts

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 December 2017
